mapper.select: /* itemMapper.itemList */ SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as row_num, tempA.store_seq, tempA.store_name, tempA.large_category, tempA.item_seq, tempA.item_name, tempA.del_yn, tempA.register_date, tempA.register_id, tempA.modify_date, tempA.modify_id FROM ( SELECT item_seq, store_seq, ( SELECT store_name FROM STOREINFO WHERE store_seq = #{storeSeq} AND del_yn ='N') AS store_name, large_category, item_name, del_yn, register_date, register_id, modify_date, modify_id FROM PRODUCTITEM WHERE store_seq= #{storeSeq} AND del_yn ='N' ORDER BY modify_date ASC ) AS tempA , (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) AS R ORDER BY row_num DESC;
mapper.insert: /* itemMapper.insertItem */ INSERT INTO PRODUCTITEM ( store_seq, item_name, large_category, del_yn, register_date, register_id, modify_date, modify_id ) VALUES ( #{storeSeq}, #{itemName}, #{largeCategory}, 'N', now(), 'admin', now(), 'admin' )
mapper.select: /* itemMapper.itemDetail */ SELECT item_seq, store_seq, ( SELECT store_name FROM STOREINFO WHERE store_seq = #{storeSeq} AND del_yn ='N') AS store_name, item_name, large_category, register_date, register_id, modify_date, modify_id FROM PRODUCTITEM WHERE item_seq= #{itemSeq} AND store_seq= #{storeSeq} AND del_yn ='N'
